content: a fun triangle granny square bandana for that trendy summer vibe a pretty crochet bandana is a great way to keep your hair neat and tidy an easy to crochet fun project and one size will fit nearly everyone any dk weight/light worsted weight yarn will work great for this pattern choose one ball of yarn as your main color approx 100m and add small amounts of contrast shades for a crochet head kerchief in this size you will need 10 granny squares and 5 granny triangles this pattern is also featured in the designer s pick for summer blog hop that runs from june 1 - july 3 2022 link to blog hop you can also get 33 other amazing summertime patterns in the designer s pick for summer pattern bundle for a fraction of the normal price pattern bundle 1 1 https //anniedesign--itchinforsomestitchin thrivecart com/designers-pick-for-summer2022/
